mapper.sql: id, cas_no, smiles, MLOGP, SpMax_EAri, Mor04s, SM02_AEAdm, RDF075s, NOEC_21d, exp_value, pre_value, datatype
mapper.insert:
insert into daphnia_chronic
id,
cas_no,
smiles,
MLOGP,
SpMax_EAri,
Mor04s,
SM02_AEAdm,
RDF075s,
NOEC_21d,
exp_value,
pre_value,
datatype,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mlogp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{spmaxEari,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{mor04s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{sm02Aeadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{rdf075s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{noec21d,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update daphnia_chronic
cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLOGP = #{mlogp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SpMax_EAri = #{spmaxEari,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Mor04s = #{mor04s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SM02_AEAdm = #{sm02Aeadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RDF075s = #{rdf075s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NOEC_21d = #{noec21d,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datatype = #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update daphnia_chronic
smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MLOGP = #{mlogp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SpMax_EAri = #{spmaxEari,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Mor04s = #{mor04s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SM02_AEAdm = #{sm02Aeadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RDF075s = #{rdf075s,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NOEC_21d = #{noec21d,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cas_no = #{casNo} and datatype = #{datatype}

update daphnia_chronic set cas_no = #{casNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smiles = #{smiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MLOGP = #{mlogp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SpMax_EAri = #{spmaxEari,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Mor04s = #{mor04s,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SM02_AEAdm = #{sm02Aeadm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RDF075s = #{rdf075s,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NOEC_21d = #{noec21d,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exp_value = #{expValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_value = #{preValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datatype = #{datatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as TP, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as TN, sum(if(exp_value=1 and pre_value=0 ,1,0)) as FN, sum(if(exp_value=0 and pre_value=1 ,1,0)) as FP, sum(if(datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,0)) as nums from (select from daphnia_chronic where datatype=#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as newtable
